PHRASE.LANG: kName
HGL Creature Costume & Companion Bundle
Lot costume créature & compagnon HGL
HGL-Outfit- und -Begleiter-Set
Costume Creatura HGL e Set Compagno
Set Disfraz de Criatura HGL y Criatura de compañía
HGL Creature Costume & Companion Bundle

HGL Creature Costume & Companion Bundle
kDesc

This mega bundle gives you all the HGL Creature Costumes and all of the HGL Mini-Creature Companions.
 
 This bundle includes:
 (1) HGL Creature Costume - Troops (Male)
 (2) HGL Creature Costume - Troops (Female)
 (3) HGL Creature Costume - Critters (Male)
 (4) HGL Creature Costume - Critters (Female)
 (5) HGL Creature Costume - Sonics (Male)
 (6) HGL Creature Costume - Sonics (Female)
 (7) HGL Creature Costume - Undead (Male)
 (8) HGL Creature Costume - Undead (Female)
 (9) HGL Mini-Creature Companion - Troops
 (10) HGL Mini-Creature Companion - Critters
 (11) HGL Mini-Creature Companion - Sonics
 (12) HGL Mini-Creature Companion - Undead
 
 Purchasing this item grants you 240 fights in HGL. [#Legal]

Ce méga-lot réunit l'ensemble des costumes créature HGL et des compagnons minicréatures HGL.
 

Ce lot comprend :

(1) Costume créature HGL — Troops (Homme)
 (2) Costume créature HGL — Troops (Femme)

(3) Costume créature HGL — Critters (Homme)
 (4) Costume créature HGL — Critters (Femme)
 (5) Costume créature HGL — Sonics (Homme)

(6) Costume créature HGL — Sonics (Femme)

(7) Costume créature HGL — Undead (Homme)

(8) Costume créature HGL — Undead (Femme)

(9) Compagnon minicréature HGL — Troops

(10) Compagnon minicréature HGL — Critters

(11) Compagnon minicréature HGL — Sonics

(12) Compagnon minicréature HGL — Undead
 
 L'achat de cet article vous donne droit à 240 combats dans HGL. [#Legal]

Dieses Mega-Set beinhaltet alle HGL-Outfits und alle HGL-Begleiter.
 
 Dieses Set beinhaltet:
 (1) HGL-Outfit – Troops (Männlich)
 (2) HGL-Outfit – Troops (Weiblich)
 (3) HGL-Outfit – Critters (Männlich)
 (4) HGL-Outfit – Critters (Weiblich)
 (5) HGL-Outfit – Sonics (Männlich)
 (6) HGL-Outfit – Sonics (Weiblich)
 (7) HGL-Outfit – Undead (Männlich)
 (8) HGL-Outfit – Undead (Weiblich)
 (9) HGL-Begleiter – Troops
 (10) HGL-Begleiter – Critters
 (11) HGL-Begleiter – Sonics
 (12) HGL-Begleiter – Undead
 
 Wenn du diesen Artikel kaufst, bekommst du 240 Kämpfe in HGL. [#Legal]

Questo super set ti offre tutti i Costumi delle Creature HGL e tutti i Compagni Mini-Creature HGL.
 
 Il set comprende:
 (1) Costume Creatura HGL - Troops (Uomo)
 (2) Costume Creatura HGL - Troops (Donna)
 (3) Costume Creatura HGL - Critters (Uomo)
 (4) Costume Creatura HGL - Critters (Donna)
 (5) Costume Creatura HGL - Sonics (Uomo)
 (6) Costume Creatura HGL - Sonics (Donna)
 (7) Costume Creatura HGL - Undead (Uomo)
 (8) Costume Creatura HGL - Undead (Donna)
 (9) Compagno Mini-Creatura HGL - Troops
 (10) Compagno Mini-Creatura HGL - Critters
 (11) Compagno Mini-Creatura HGL - Sonics
 (12) Compagno Mini-Creatura HGL - Undead
 
 Con l'acquisto di questo articolo potrai partecipare a 240 lotte in HGL. [#Legal]

Este megaset te ofrece todos los disfraces de Criaturas HGL y todas las Mini-criaturas de compañía HGL.
 
 Este set incluye:
 (1) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Troops (Hombre)
 (2) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Troops (Mujer)
 (3) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Critters (Hombre)
 (4) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Critters (Mujer)
 (5) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Sonics (Hombre)
 (6) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Sonics (Mujer)
 (7) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Undead (Hombre)
 (8) Disfraz de Criatura HGL - Undead (Mujer)
 (9) Mini-criatura de compañía HGL - Troops
 (10) Mini-criatura de compañía HGL - Critters
 (11) Mini-criatura de compañía HGL - Sonics
 (12) Mini-criatura de compañía HGL - Undead
 
 Comprar este artículo te permite 240 combates en HGL. [#Legal]

This mega bundle gives you all the HGL Creature Costumes and all of the HGL Mini-Creature Companions.
 
 This bundle includes:
 (1) HGL Creature Costume - Troops (Male)
 (2) HGL Creature Costume - Troops (Female)
 (3) HGL Creature Costume - Critters (Male)
 (4) HGL Creature Costume - Critters (Female)
